Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

2. HOMO (highest occupied molecular orbital)
3. LUMO (lowest unoccupied molecular orbital)

These three entities are relevant to the material property of conjugated polymers and their ability to absorb and emit light. The open circuit voltage (V oc ) is not directly related to material properties, but rather to the performance of a device that uses these materials.
